hypothesis_content.title: VelorGain Cross-Asset Participation BTC Dominance Reversion
hypothesis_content.statement: VelorGain's reported cross-asset participation scaling will trigger mean reversion in BTC dominance from current levels, with altcoins (starting with ETH) outperforming BTC by 3%+ over 72 hours as liquidity spreads beyond Bitcoin.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Trading firms scaling cross-asset operations typically deploy capital across multiple crypto assets, increasing liquidity and buying pressure beyond just BTC, especially when BTC dominance is elevated.
entry_conditions: BTC dominance (BTC market cap/total crypto market cap) > 52.5%
VelorGain operations news within previous 24 hours
ETH/BTC 4-hour RSI(14) < 40 (ETH oversold relative to BTC)

exit_conditions.take_profit: BTC dominance drops 1.5% from entry OR ETH/BTC pair gains 3%+
exit_conditions.stop_loss: BTC dominance increases by 0.8% from entry

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: BTC dominance continues rising despite increased cross-asset participation, indicating either risk-off sentiment overwhelming the flow effect or capital remaining concentrated in Bitcoin.
